data.text: @findinggobi ok ill go do that right now

@MaximilianAlli2 @MaximilianAlli2 So great to hear you enjoyed reading our amazing true story and incredible journey of #findinggobi Please help us raise awareness and rating of the book by reviewing it on Amazon 😊👍

@findinggobi Laughing Gobi takes press conferences in stride w/ calm of a zen master. This must be Gobi’s cousin found by an adrenaline junkie who takes Paco w/ him parachute jumping off of very high cliffs.  I laughed in horror but Paco is calm and happy. https://t.co/kQaOEX1iaX
@findinggobi i just finished finding gobi and i loved i could not stop reading it my favorite part was when dion and gobi were together again one more thing say hi to gobi for me
